name: dishes
look_description: Various dishware, including plates, silverware, and glasses are scattered across the table. You wonder why no one cleaned this all up. It almost seems as if a dinner party ended abruptly here.

touch.text: he dishware is cool and feels delicate.

smell.text: The dishware smells dusty but otherwise untouched.

throw.text: You contemplate hurling a plate at the wall, but after looking at the delicate roses painstakingly painted around the rim, you decide better of it.
